name: Sumit Shinde
title: Technical Writer
bio: Sumit Shinde is a Technical Writer at FlowFuse, where he creates clear, in-depth content focused on Node-RED, manufacturing automation, and industrial IoT. His writing helps developers, engineers, and manufacturers understand how to deploy and scale Node-RED in production environments using FlowFuse. Sumit frequently covers topics such as OPC UA, MQTT, PLC integration, and real-time data flows, bridging the gap between industrial systems and modern IoT solutions. He is passionate about simplifying complex technical concepts and enabling the digital transformation of manufacturing through actionable, hands-on guides and tutorials.
facts: Experienced love at first sight with Node-RED and enjoys writing and reading about it.
